message: Bob, I'm offering you this unique product at a price of $850,000. I believe it's a fair price considering its value to you, and I'm confident it will be a valuable asset. Let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $700,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Bob, I understand your perspective on the price. While I'm willing to be flexible, $700,000 is significantly lower than the value I place on this product.  I'm willing to come down to $750,000, which reflects a compromise on both our ends.  Let me know if you're willing to meet me there.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit higher than $750,000. I'm thinking more along the lines of $725,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
